title: Export Data
content:
The CLI should support a command to export data.

It should export all data except for timestamps into a `.zamm` folder in the current directory. The exported folder should contain a `specs/` folder with a separate JSON file for each spec, a `spec-links.csv` file with links between specs (no link IDs needed), a `commit-links.csv` file with links between specs and commits (no link IDs needed), and a `project_metadata.json` file with project metadata (no `project_metadata.id` is needed, only the `root_spec_id`).
